actions.name: Toxic Shock

cost.trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[poison] or @Affliction[paralysis] to a creature after hitting with a damaging Poison or Electric-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[poison] or @Affliction[paralysis] to a creature after hitting with a damaging Poison or Electric-Type attack.

Effect: The user applies both @Affliction[poison] and @Affliction[paralysis] for an equal number of Activations.
